game.name: Wake Up and Jump!
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wake Up and Jump! is a challenging retro platformer where precision matters. Dash through a cute but dangerous world, push your skills to the limit in this speedrun-oriented adventure and uncover secret stages… if you’re skilled enough.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wake Up and Jump! is a challenging retro platformer where precision matters. Dash through a cute but dangerous world, push your skills to the limit in this speedrun-oriented adventure and uncover secret stages… if you’re skilled enough.
